channel.title: epubkit on Pseudoyu
channel.description: Recent content in epubkit on Pseudoyu

item.title: Weekly Review #66 - 10x Engineers, Technical Passion and Personal Toolkit
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece records and reflects on my life from 2024-07-22 to 2024-07-30. After an exceptionally rich Adventure X week of activities, I’ve returned to the daily routine of coding with focused attention. I’ve been busy with work requirements; continuing to develop the API portion of EpubKit using Cloudflare Worker; refactoring the backend of a side project I started over a year ago but never fully realized using Go, and beginning to attempt writing an API server in Rust; created an Astro web project “tools.

item.title: Weekly Review #65 - Adventure X Experience, Apple Notes Practice, and EpubKit
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece records and reflects on my life from July 10 to July 21, 2024. This week and a half has been quite eventful. Work has been somewhat busy. I participated in the Adventure X event, which was a lot of fun. I experimented with the Remix framework and prepared for a workshop. I met with Randy, and together we planned the redesign and subsequent development of EpubKit, essentially holding our own hackathon for us “middle-aged hippies” who couldn’t participate in the competition.

item.title: Weekly Review #60 - Beside Bugs, Educational Philosophy and EpubKit
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece is a record and reflection of my life from May 16, 2024 to June 2, 2024. Study Tour in Nanjing I had attended several Yixi talks in Beijing before and quite enjoyed their style. By chance, I saw they were organizing a parent-child study tour in Nanjing. One of the arrangements was to visit the studio of designer/writer Zhu Yingchun, whom my senior
